---

# Project Plan Contract

A project plan is valid only when scope, schedule, dependencies, risk, and decision cadence are explicit.

## Required sections

1. Objectives and non-goals
2. Scope boundaries and assumptions
3. Milestones and delivery slices
4. Dependency and critical path map
5. Risk register and mitigations
6. Variance trigger rules and escalation
7. Checkpoint cadence and gate criteria
8. Replan policy and decision log

- [Project plan template](./templates/project-plan.md)
